<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns parameters describing group in [[High Command|high command]] bar. Return value is array in format [groupName, teamName] or [] if error. Possible values for team name:
* <tt>"teammain"</tt> (default)
* <tt>"teamred"</tt>
* <tt>"teamgreen"</tt>
* <tt>"teamblue"</tt>
* <tt>"teamyellow"</tt>

 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''hcGroupParams''' group </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[hcGroupParams]] someGroup;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[High Command]],[[hcAllGroups]],[[hcLeader]], [[hcRemoveAllGroups]], [[hcRemoveGroup]], [[hcSelected]], [[hcSelectGroup]], [[hcSetGroup]], [[hcShowBar]], [[hcShownBar]], [[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
